title: Shiny Notes
text:
Welcome
Welcome to Brad Cannell’s Shiny Notes!
This is a Quarto Book version Brad Cannell’s Shiny Notes. I’m really making this book for myself, but even better if you find it useful too!
Why am I doing this (as opposed to just keeping notes locally)?

Better organized (e.g., chapter structure and search)

Easy access – just click on the bookmark on web browser

Practice using Quarto
